name: X-GPT
description: X-GPT is Revolutionizing the way we interact with blockchain, providing an intuitive conversational interface for all your blockchain-related tasks. X-GPT is an AI powered Conversational Interface for crypto services. It is incepted as a meme with higher intelligence, from X.ai narrative. The contract is 0% tax, renounced and LP Burnt. The project development is backed by metareset.ai development team XGPT is a dynamic and continually evolving platform, committed to integrating all existing and upcoming DApps and services within the crypto ecosystem. Main Features: DEX Trading XGPT makes trading as easy as chatting! With our AI, you can buy and sell on DEX platforms just by having a simple conversation Block Explorer Block Explorer Exploring the blockchain is as simple as a chat with XGPT! Our AI assists you in retrieving key data from block explorers, just by carrying out a casual conversation Market Data Market Data With XGPT, you can access real-time market data effortlessly! Just chat with our AI to fetch the latest updates on any token, anytime, anywhere.
